description:
See issue link for screenshots & full details:

The red square tooltip nearby the loan account name on the client details page reads Active when it should it in fact be Active in Bad Standing.

Please adjust accordingly. See https://mifosforge.jira.com/wiki/spaces/docs/pages/68354078/Loan+Accounts for more on loan cycle states.

See screenshots
name: Mifos X Web App #2683 - Red Tooltip for Loan Account in Client Summary Should be Active in Bad Standing
